channel.title: JavaFX on Jagar
channel.description: Recent content in JavaFX on Jagar

item.title: How to create Firebase login usb
item.description: We will handle the Firebase admin SDK private key in a USB drive then login with it, once the USB is connected using the admin SDK for Java documentations.

item.title: How to create a gradle project with javaFX in intellij
item.description: We will in few steps how we can work on javaFX within a gradle project in the new intellij build 2019.2 which may apply other builds too.

item.title: The easiest and best way to pass data (arguments) between controllers in JavaFX
item.description: Most of programs in this world would need to pass different data and arguments between the different layouts and screens, so we will explain the easiest way to have this done in JavaFX in this tutorial.
